means: 使变形，使完全改变性质

PerfectNetExp.abs: emanate　散发；发出,transmogrify 　 使变形；使改变fetishist 　 物神崇拜者
transmit 传播,传达transmogrify 彻底改变transmute 使变化
emanate　散发；发出,transmogrify 　 使变形；使改变fetishist 　 物神崇拜者
verify prove to be true,conform 证实；证明transmogrify 变得古怪，变形petrify 使发呆.

means.word_mean: 1. change completely the nature or appearance of;

sentences.sentence: "In Kafka's story, a person metamorphoses into a bug"
"The treatment and diet transfigured her into a beautiful young woman"

auth_sentence.content: The Managers do their best to transmogrify other exculpatory testimony into evidence of criminality.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Managers do their best to transmogrify other exculpatory testimony into evidence of criminality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Managers do their best to transmogrify other exculpatory testimony into evidence of criminality.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"变换,改变,转移"; 2. 表示"横过,越过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+it走+ory……的→走过就变→短暂的
trans横过,越过+continental大陆的→adj.横贯大陆的
trans横过,越过+luc光+ent……的→穿过去看到光
trans横过,越过+noraml正常的→adj.超出常规的
trans横过,越过+par看见+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
trans横过,越过+vers转+e→adj.横向的, 横断的
trans变换,改变,转移+action行动→交换行动→交易

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+port运→搬运转移→运输

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+fer带→转移过去→转学,转移
trans变换,改变,转移+plant种→转移过去→移植
trans变换,改变,转移+scribe写→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→抄写
trans变换,改变,转移+figure形状→改变形状

stems_affixes.value_cn: 改变,变换;变压;转化;改造,改造
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,改变,转移+form形状→改变形状
trans变换,改变,转移+fuse流→[血]流过去→输血
trans变换,改变,转移+mogr怪形状+ify表动词→变成怪形状
trans变换,改变,转移+port运→搬运转移→运输
trans横过,越过+scend爬→爬过→超越
trans横过,越过+sect切→横切
trans横过,越过+gress走→横着走→冒犯
